data.current_description: Retrieve all calls, using query parameters to specify the information that gets returned.
data.summary_suggestion: List all calls with filtering and pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of all calls. Use query parameters to filter results, specify which properties to return, and control pagination. Returns a collection of call objects with the requested properties and pagination details for retrieving additional results.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks specificity about pagination, filtering capabilities, and return structure. data.current_summary: Create or update a batch of calls by unique property
data.current_description: Create or update a batch of calls by ID (`callId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`).
data.description_suggestion: Create or update multiple calls in a single batch operation by ID (`callId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Accepts an array of call objects with properties and optional associations. Returns a batch response indicating success or failure for each record, with HTTP 207 indicating partial success when some records fail.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate, but description lacks critical details about batch operation mechanics. Enhanced version clarifies that it accepts an array of objects, explains the dual-key matching strategy, describes the response format including partial success handling (207 status), and helps AI agents understand how to handle batch results and errors.

data.current_description: Search for calls by filtering on properties, searching through associations, and sorting results. Learn more about [CRM search](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/search#make-a-search-request).
data.summary_suggestion: Search calls with filters, associations, and sorting
data.description_suggestion: Search for calls using advanced filtering on properties, association-based queries, and result sorting. Accepts a search request with filter groups, association filters, and sort specifications. Returns a paginated list of matching call objects with their properties and associations. Supports complex boolean logic for multi-criteria searches.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description mentions capabilities but lacks specificity about input structure and output format. data.current_description: Retrieve a batch of calls by ID.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve multiple call records by their IDs in a single batch request. Accepts an array of call IDs and optional property specifications. Returns a batch response containing the requested call objects with their properties and associations. Supports partial success with error details for failed retrievals.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. Added clarity about batch input format, what properties can be specified, return structure including error handling, and that this is a multi-record retrieval operation for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'delete-/crm/v3/objects/calls/{callId}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, inconsistent_terminology, missing_output_details. Summary uses 'Archive' but description uses 'Delete' - terminology inconsistency. Description lacks clarity on what is returned. Clarified that recordings are permanently deleted while the call record itself can be restored, and added return value information for AI agent clarity.

data.current_description: Delete a call by ID. A deleted call can be restored within 90 days of being deleted, but the recording will be permanently deleted. Learn more about [restoring activity records](https://knowledge.hubspot.com/records/restore-deleted-activity-in-a-record).
data.description_suggestion: Delete (archive) a call by ID. Deleted calls can be restored within 90 days, but associated call recordings are permanently deleted immediately. Returns confirmation of deletion. See documentation on restoring deleted activity records for recovery procedures.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Archive' but description uses 'Delete' - terminology inconsistency. Description lacks clarity on what is returned. Clarified that recordings are permanently deleted while the call record itself can be restored, and added return value information for AI agent clarity.

Missing output details about batch response structure. Clarified batch operation semantics and added return value information for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Archive a batch of calls by ID. Deleted calls can be restored within 90 days of being deleted, but call recordings recording will be permanently deleted. Learn more about [restoring activity records](https://knowledge.hubspot.com/records/restore-deleted-activity-in-a-record).
data.description_suggestion: Delete (archive) multiple call records by ID in a single batch request. Accepts an array of call IDs. Deleted calls can be restored within 90 days, but associated call recordings are permanently deleted immediately. Returns batch response with deletion status for each call. See documentation on restoring deleted activity records.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Archive' but description uses 'Delete' - terminology inconsistency. Description has typo ('recording will be permanently deleted' repeated). Missing output details about batch response structure. Clarified batch operation semantics and added return value information for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/objects/calls/batch/update_update' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Description is too minimal and lacks critical details. Missing information about input structure, update semantics (overwrite behavior), return format, and error handling. Added comprehensive details about batch operation behavior, property update semantics, and response structure for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Update a batch of calls by ID.
data.description_suggestion: Update multiple call records by ID in a single batch request. Accepts an array of call IDs with property values to update. Provided properties will be overwritten for each record. Returns a batch response containing updated call objects and any errors encountered during processing. Partial success is supported with error details for failed updates.
data.reasoning: Description is too minimal and lacks critical details. Missing information about input structure, update semantics (overwrite behavior), return format, and error handling. Added comprehensive details about batch operation behavior, property update semantics, and response structure for better AI agent interpretability.
